Yes and no. Well it sho=
uld, but I have no idea what DBCS is...

Johannes

DBCS stands for Double B=
yte Character Set, it is commonly used to indicate
those countries using id=
eographic languages that cannot use Single Byte
Character Set (SBCS). Most =
programs have problems in these environments if not
specifically tested. I =
tried Junit (the text version) and it seems to work
fine....
